===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
Perhaps a [[象形|pictogram]] of a crack in an [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oracle_bone oracle bone], used for divination in ancient China. The word itself (Old Chinese: ''*puk'') may be [[onomatopoeia|onomatopoeic]] in origin.
